confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
confidentialite.intro: This privacy policy explains how renaissance-eyewear (the "Site", "we", "our" or "us") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you visit, use our services, or make a purchase on renaissanceeyewear.fr (the "Site") or otherwise communicate with us regarding the Site (collectively, the "Services"). For the purposes of this privacy policy, "you", "your" refers to you as a user of the Services, whether you are a customer, website visitor, or other person whose information we have collected in accordance with this privacy policy.
confidentialite.readCarefully: Please read this privacy policy carefully.
confidentialite.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time, including to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will post the revised privacy policy on the Site, update the "Last Updated" date, and take any other steps required by applicable law.
confidentialite.howWeCollectTitle: How We Collect and Use Your Personal Information
confidentialite.howWeCollectText1: To provide the Services, we collect and have collected over the past 12 months personal information about you from various sources, as described below. The information we collect and use varies depending on how you interact with us.
confidentialite.howWeCollectText2: In addition to the specific uses described below, we may use the information we collect about you to communicate with you, provide or improve the Services, comply with any applicable legal obligations, enforce applicable terms of service, and protect or defend the Services, our rights, and the rights of our users or others.
confidentialite.personalInfoText: The types of personal information we obtain about you depend on how you interact with our Site and use our Services. When we use the term "personal information," we refer to information that identifies, relates to, describes, or can be associated with you.
confidentialite.directInfoTitle: Information We Collect Directly From You
confidentialite.directInfoText: Information you submit directly to us through our Services may include:
directInfoItems: Contact details including your name, address, phone number, and email.
Order information including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment confirmation, email and phone number.
Account information including your username, password, security questions, and other information used for account security.
Customer service information including information you choose to include in your communications with us.
confidentialite.usageInfoTitle: Information We Collect About Your Usage
confidentialite.usageInfoText: We may also automatically collect certain information about your interaction with the Services ("Usage Data"). To do this, we may use cookies, pixels, and similar technologies ("Cookies"). Usage Data may include information about how you access and use our Site and your account, including device information, browser information, network connection information, your IP address, and other information about your interaction with the Services.
confidentialite.thirdPartyInfoTitle: Information We Obtain From Third Parties
confidentialite.thirdPartyInfoText: Finally, we may obtain information about you from third parties, including vendors and service providers who may collect information on our behalf, such as:
thirdPartyInfoItems: Companies that support our Site and Services, such as Shopify.
Our payment processors, which collect payment information to process your payment in order to fulfill your orders.
confidentialite.howWeUseTitle: How We Use Your Personal Information
confidentialite.providingServicesText: We use your personal information to provide you with the Services in order to perform the contract we have with you, including to process your payments, fulfill your orders, send you notifications about your account, purchases, returns, exchanges, or other transactions.
confidentialite.marketingText: We may use your personal information for marketing and promotional purposes, such as to send marketing, advertising, and promotional communications by email, SMS, or postal mail, and to show you advertisements for products or services.
confidentialite.securityText: We use your personal information to detect, investigate, or take action regarding potential fraudulent, illegal, or malicious activities.
confidentialite.cookiesText1: Like many websites, we use cookies on our Site. For specific information about the cookies we use in connection with operating our store with Shopify, please visit https://www.shopify.com/legal/cookies.
confidentialite.cookiesText2: Most browsers automatically accept cookies by default, but you can choose to configure your browser to remove or reject cookies through your browser controls.
confidentialite.disclosureText: In certain circumstances, we may disclose your personal information to third parties, including:
disclosureItems: Vendors or other third parties who perform services on our behalf (e.g., IT management, payment processing, data analysis, customer service).
Business and marketing partners to provide you with services and deliver advertising.
When you ask us to disclose or otherwise consent to our disclosure of certain information to third parties.
confidentialite.childrenText: The Services are not intended for use by children, and we do not knowingly collect any personal information about children.
confidentialite.retentionTitle: Security and Retention of Your Information
confidentialite.retentionText: Please be aware that no security measures are perfect or impenetrable and we cannot guarantee "perfect security." Additionally, any information you send to us may not be secure during transit.
confidentialite.rightsText: Depending on your place of residence, you may benefit from the following rights:
rightsItems: Right of access/to know: You may request access to the personal information we hold about you.
Right of deletion: You may request that we delete the personal information we hold about you.
Right of correction: You may request that we correct the personal information we hold about you.
Right of portability: You may receive a copy of the personal information we hold about you.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This policy explains how Renaissance Eyewear uses cookies and similar technologies on our website renaissanceeyewear.fr.
cookies.whatIsText: A cookie is a small text file stored on your computer, tablet, or smartphone when you visit a website. Cookies allow the site to recognize your device and remember your actions and preferences over a period of time.
cookies.whyText: We use cookies for several reasons:
whyItems: Ensuring the proper technical functioning of the site
Remembering your preferences (language, currency, items in cart)
cookies.essentialText: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the site. They allow you to navigate the site and use its basic features.
cookies.essentialDuration: Retention period: Session (deleted when the browser is closed) or up to 30 days.
cookies.personalizationText: These cookies store details about your actions to personalize your next visit to the website.
cookies.advertisingText: These cookies are used to optimize commercial communications and show you advertisements on other sites.
cookies.analyticsText: These cookies help us understand how you interact with the site. We use this data to identify areas for improvement.
analyticsItems: Google Analytics (traffic analysis, pages visited, visit duration)
cookies.thirdPartyText: Some cookies are placed by third-party services we use:
cookies.shopifyText: Our online store is hosted on Shopify. For more information about Shopify cookies, please visit: https://www.shopify.com/legal/cookies
cookies.googleAnalyticsText: We use Google Analytics to analyze our site usage. For more information: Google Privacy Policy
cookies.socialText: Cookies may be placed by social network platforms (Instagram, Facebook) when you interact with our social content.
cookies.manageTitle: How to Manage Your Cookie Preferences?
cookies.bannerText: On your first visit, a banner allows you to choose which cookies you accept. You can modify your preferences at any time by clicking the "Manage my cookies" link at the bottom of the page.
cookies.browserText: Most browsers automatically accept cookies by default, but you can modify your browser settings to:
browserItems: Be notified before a cookie is placed
instructionsItems: Google Chrome: Menu > Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
Mozilla Firefox: Menu > Options > Privacy and security
Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
Microsoft Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions
cookies.gpcText1: Our site recognizes the Global Privacy Control (GPC) signal. If you enable this signal in your browser, we will treat it as a valid request to opt out of sharing or targeted advertising.
cookies.consequencesText: Please note that blocking or deleting certain cookies may:
consequencesItems: Prevent access to certain site features
cookies.updateText: We may update this cookie policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.
cookies.contactText: For any questions regarding our use of cookies, you may contact us:
contactItems: Address: 4 RUE DES METIERS, HETTANGE GRANDE, 57330, France

garantie.title: Warranty & After-Sales Service
garantie.seoDescription: 2-year warranty RENAISSANCE Paris. After-sales service, repairs, maintenance and advice for your luxury eyewear. Satisfaction guaranteed.
garantie.warrantyText: All Renaissance products benefit from a 2-year manufacturer's warranty from the date of purchase, covering manufacturing and material defects.
notCoveredItems: Normal wear and tear from daily use
Modifications or repairs performed by unauthorized third parties
Damage caused by exposure to chemicals
garantie.afterSalesText: Our after-sales service is dedicated to ensuring your complete satisfaction and the longevity of your Renaissance eyewear.
garantie.warrantyRepairText: If your frame has a defect covered by the warranty:
warrantyRepairItems: Contact us at contact@renaissance-eyewear.fr with your order number and photos of the defect
Our team will evaluate your request within 48 hours
If the warranty applies, we will send you a prepaid return label
Return the frame in its original packaging
We will perform the repair or replacement within 15 business days
garantie.outOfWarrantyText: For damage not covered by the warranty, we offer a paid repair service:
outOfWarrantyItems: Free quote within 48 hours of receiving the frame
Competitive rates depending on the nature of the repair
Repair time: 2 to 4 weeks depending on complexity
repairTypesItems: Hinge replacement: If your hinges are damaged
Temple straightening: To restore the original shape
Polishing: To restore the original metal shine
Rhinestone resetting: If a rhinestone has fallen out
cleaningItems: Use exclusively the microfiber cloth provided with your glasses
For deeper cleaning, use warm soapy water
Gently dry with the microfiber cloth
Never use chemicals, alcohol, or solvents
storageItems: Always store your glasses in their case when not wearing them
Never place them face down to avoid scratches
Avoid prolonged exposure to high temperatures (dashboard, radiator)
Do not leave them in a humid environment
precautionsItems: Always handle your glasses with both hands to preserve temple balance
Do not wear your glasses on top of your head, as this deforms the temples
Have your glasses regularly adjusted by an optician
Avoid contact with hairspray, perfume, and cosmetics
garantie.opticiansText: Our 200+ partner opticians in France can help you with:
garantie.certificateText: Each Renaissance frame comes with a numbered certificate of authenticity. This document is essential for any warranty or after-sales service request. Please keep it carefully along with your purchase invoice.
garantie.contactText: Our after-sales team is at your service:
garantie.qualityText1: Renaissance is committed to providing the highest quality products. Each frame is handcrafted in South Korea by specialized artisans and undergoes rigorous quality controls before shipping.
garantie.qualityText2: If despite all our precautions you encounter a problem with your frame, we will do everything in our power to resolve it quickly and to your complete satisfaction.

Procedures: To initiate the return, please contact our customer service by email at contact@renaissanceeyewear.com specifying your order number.

Refund or exchange: We offer either a full refund or an exchange, at your choice. Processing (verification, refund, or shipment of the new item) is completed within a maximum of 30 days from receipt of the returned product.
remboursement.section2Text: All our products benefit from a 3-year manufacturer's warranty covering manufacturing defects. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, accidental damage, or inappropriate use of the product.
remboursement.section3Text: For any questions regarding your order, a return, or an exchange, our customer service is at your disposal:

guideTailles.title: Size Guide
guideTailles.seoDescription: Find the RENAISSANCE Paris frame perfectly suited to your face. Size guide, face shapes and tips for choosing your glasses.
guideTailles.heroDescription: A complete guide to understanding our frame dimensions and choosing the one that perfectly fits your face shape.
guideTailles.lensWidthDesc: Horizontal distance of a lens, measured at its widest point.
guideTailles.bridgeDesc: Distance between the two lenses, at the bridge of the nose.
guideTailles.templesDesc: Length of the temples, from the hinge to the tip.
guideTailles.standardFormatDesc: Our dimensions are indicated in this format:
guideTailles.sizeSDesc: Ideal for slim faces and delicate builds.
guideTailles.sizeMDesc: The most common size, suitable for the majority of face shapes.
guideTailles.sizeLDesc: For wide faces and larger builds.
guideTailles.ovalAdvice: The most balanced shape. All frame shapes suit you well. Choose models that are neither too large nor too small to maintain proportions.
guideTailles.roundAdvice: Opt for rectangular or geometric frames to slim the face. Avoid overly round shapes that would accentuate the roundness.
guideTailles.squareAdvice: Round or oval frames soften angular features. Butterfly shapes are particularly flattering.
guideTailles.rectangularAdvice: Choose frames with significant lens height to visually shorten the face. Hexagonal shapes work well.
guideTailles.ctaDescription: Visit one of our partner opticians to try our collections and receive personalized advice.
